Uses of Class
org.netbeans.modules.bugtracking.api.Query

  • Packages that use Query 
    Package Description
    org.netbeans.modules.bugtracking.api
    Everybody who wants to get access to the NetBeans Bugtracking functionality should be interested in APIs in this package.

    • Uses of Query in org.netbeans.modules.bugtracking.api

      Methods in org.netbeans.modules.bugtracking.api that return types with arguments of type Query 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Collection<Query> Repository.getQueries()
      Returns a list of all saved queries for this repository.
      Methods in org.netbeans.modules.bugtracking.api with parameters of type Query 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void Util.closeQuery(Query query)
      Closes the given Query in case it is opened in a TopComponent the editor area.
      static void Util.selectQuery(Query query)
      Opens the Tasks Dashboard and selects and expands the given Query in it.
